verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2658><s%> came also to <S%G1519><s%> Derbe <S%G1191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to Lystra <S%G3082><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, named <S%G3686><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, the son <S%G5207><s%> of a5100, 1135 Jewess <S%G2453><s%> that believed <S%G4103><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> was a Greek <S%G1672><s%>.

The same <S%G3739><s%> was well reported <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> by the brethren <S%G80><s%> that were <S%G3588><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%>.

Him <S%G5126><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> have to go forth <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> circumcised <S%G4059><s%> him <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that were <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> parts <S%G1063><s%>: for they all <S%G537><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> was <S%G5225><s%> a Greek <S%G1672><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they went on their way through <S%G1279><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%>, they delivered <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the decrees <S%G1378><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> which had been ordained <S%G2919><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> that were <S%G3588><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

<S%G3303><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> were <S%G4732><s%> strengthened <S%G4732><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> increased <S%G4052><s%> in number <S%G706><s%> daily <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they went through <S%G1330><s%> the region <S%G5561><s%> of Phrygia <S%G5435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Galatia <S%G1054><s%>, having been forbidden <S%G2967><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>;

and when <S%G2596><s%> they were come <S%G2064><s%> over against Mysia <S%G3465><s%>, they assayed <S%G3985><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G2596><s%> Bithynia <S%G978><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Jesus suffered <S%G1439><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>;
and <S%G1161><s%> passing <S%G3928><s%> by Mysia <S%G3465><s%>, they came down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%> appeared <S%G3700><s%> to Paul <S%G3972><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%>: There was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%>, beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come over <S%G1224><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, and help <S%G997><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the vision <S%G3705><s%>, straightway <S%G2112><s%> we sought <S%G2212><s%> to go <S%G1831><s%> forth into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, concluding <S%G4822><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2962><s%> had called <S%G4341><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to them <S%G846><s%>.

Setting sail <S%G321><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%>, we made a straight course <S%G2113><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Samothrace <S%G4543><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> the day following <S%G1966><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Neapolis <S%G3496><s%>;

and <S%G5037><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Philippi <S%G5375><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, the first <S%G4413><s%> of the district <S%G3310><s%>, a Roman colony <S%G2862><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> we were <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> tarrying <S%G1304><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> we went <S%G1831><s%> forth without <S%G1854><s%> the gate by <S%G3844><s%> a river side <S%G4215><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> we supposed <S%G3543><s%> there was a place <S%G1511><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> we sat down <S%G2523><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto the women <S%G1135><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were come together <S%G4905><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Lydia <S%G3070><s%>, a seller of purple <S%G4211><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> of Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, one that <S%G3739><s%> worshipped <S%G4576><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, heard <S%G191><s%> us <S%G2588><s%>: whose heart the Lord <S%G2962><s%> opened <S%G1272><s%> to give heed unto <S%G4337><s%> the things which <S%G3588><s%> were spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> she was baptized <S%G907><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> household <S%G3624><s%>, she besought <S%G3870><s%> us <S%G3004><s%>, saying, If <S%G1487><s%> ye have judged <S%G2919><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and abide <S%G3306><s%> there <S%G2532><s%>. And she constrained <S%G3849><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, as we <S%G2257><s%> were going <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the place of prayer <S%G4335><s%>, that a certain <S%G5100><s%> maid <S%G3814><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of divination <S%G4436><s%> met <S%G528><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> brought <S%G3930><s%> her <S%G846><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> gain <S%G2039><s%> by soothsaying <S%G3132><s%>.

The same <S%G3778><s%> following <S%G2628><s%> after Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out <S%G3004><s%>, saying, These <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> of the Most High <S%G5310><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> proclaim unto <S%G2605><s%> you <S%G2254><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> she <S%G4160><s%> did for <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, being sore troubled <S%G1278><s%>, turned <S%G1994><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, I charge <S%G3853><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G575><s%> her <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> it came out <S%G1831><s%> that very <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when her <S%G846><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> gain <S%G2039><s%> was gone <S%G1831><s%>, they laid hold <S%G1949><s%> on Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>, and dragged <S%G1670><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the marketplace <S%G58><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> when they had brought <S%G4317><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto the magistrates <S%G4755><s%>, they said <S%G2036><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%>, do exceedingly trouble <S%G1613><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> set forth <S%G2605><s%> customs <S%G1485><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> to receive <S%G3858><s%>, or <S%G3761><s%> to observe <S%G4160><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> rose up together <S%G4911><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the magistrates <S%G4755><s%> rent their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> off <S%G4048><s%> them <S%G2753><s%>, and commanded to beat them with rods <S%G4463><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had laid <S%G2007><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%> upon them <S%G846><s%>, they cast <S%G906><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, charging <S%G3853><s%> the jailor <S%G1200><s%> to keep <S%G5083><s%> them <S%G846><s%> safely <S%G806><s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a charge <S%G3852><s%>, cast <S%G906><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the inner <S%G2082><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G805><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> fast <S%G805><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the stocks <S%G3586><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> about <S%G2596><s%> midnight <S%G3317><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> were praying <S%G4336><s%> and singing hymns <S%G5214><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the prisoners <S%G1198><s%> were listening <S%G1874><s%> to them <S%G846><s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> suddenly <S%G869><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> the foundations <S%G2310><s%> of the prison-house <S%G1201><s%> were shaken <S%G4531><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> were opened <S%G455><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%>'s bands <S%G1199><s%> were loosed <S%G447><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the jailor <S%G1200><s%>, being roused out <S%G1096><s%> of sleep <S%G1853><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> the prison <S%G1200><s%> doors <S%G2374><s%> open <S%G455><s%>, drew <S%G4685><s%> his sword <S%G3162><s%> and was <S%G3195><s%> about to kill <S%G337><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, supposing that <S%G3543><s%> the prisoners <S%G1198><s%> had escaped <S%G1628><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> cried <S%G5455><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Do <S%G4238><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> harm <S%G2556><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> all <S%G537><s%> here <S%G1759><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he called <S%G154><s%> for lights <S%G5457><s%> and sprang in <S%G1530><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G1096><s%> trembling <S%G1790><s%> for fear <S%G4363><s%>, fell down before Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G4254><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> and said <S%G5346><s%>, Sirs <S%G2962><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> to be <S%G2443><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt be saved <S%G4982><s%>, thou and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they spake <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, with all <S%G3956><s%> that were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> them846, 1722 the same <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> of the night <S%G3571><s%>, and washed <S%G3068><s%> their <S%G575><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> was baptized <S%G907><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%>, immediately <S%G3916><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1096><s%> it was day <S%G2250><s%>, the magistrates <S%G4755><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> the serjeants <S%G4465><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Let <S%G630><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> men <S%G444><s%> go <S%G630><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the jailor <S%G1200><s%> reported <S%G518><s%> the <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Paul <S%G3754><s%>, saying <S%G4755><s%>, The magistrates have sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> let you go <S%G630><s%>: now <S%G3568><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come forth <S%G1831><s%>, and go <S%G1831><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, They have beaten <S%G1194><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> publicly <S%G1219><s%>, uncondemned <S%G178><s%>, men that are <S%G5225><s%> Romans <S%G444><s%>, and have cast <S%G906><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> do they now <S%G3568><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1544><s%> privily <S%G2977><s%>? Nay <S%G3756><s%> verily <S%G1063><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> let them come <S%G2064><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> and bring <S%G1806><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1219><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the serjeants <S%G4465><s%> reported <S%G312><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> unto the magistrates <S%G4755><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> and besought <S%G3870><s%> them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> when they had brought <S%G1806><s%> them out <S%G1806><s%>, they asked <S%G2065><s%> them to go <S%G1831><s%> away from the city <S%G4172><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they went <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the prison <S%G5438><s%>, and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house of Lydia <S%G3070><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they had seen <S%G1492><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, they comforted <S%G3870><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%>.
